persistence

Interface DAO<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - a generic object representing an entry in the database.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UserDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOImpl, UserDAOMock

    public interface DAO<T>
    This interface exposes the basic CRUD operations performed on the database that are shared by all the DAOs (Data Access Objects). It is intended to by extended by more specific DAOs if those operations are not sufficient.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates an entry in the database.

      Deletes an entry in the database.
      T find(T obj)
      Finds an object in the database by its id.
      T getUser(T user) 
      void update(T obj)
